caption.p:
Nitrite quantification in the supernatant of the BALB/c peritoneal macrophage treated with Syzygium aromaticum essential oil (200 g/mL) or eugenol (200 g/mL) and stimulated or not with Trypanosoma cruzi. Data represent mean ± standard deviation of experiment realized in sextuplicate;
∗
∗
p < 0.01,
∗
∗
∗
p < 0.001 when compared with untreated and unstimulated macrophages or, between brackets, with the Mann–Whitney test.
